episode_summary: In this episode, Kim Rittberg emphasizes the importance of creating a professional 'About Me' video to effectively market oneself as a real estate agent. She introduces the ABC method, focusing on Accomplishments, Business focus, and Confidence, to help agents craft compelling narratives that build trust and relationships with potential clients. The episode also highlights the benefits of investing in professional video production to enhance personal branding.
